    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ControlRST​(IPerception perception, INavigation navigation, lejos.nxt.NXTMotor leftMotor, lejos.nxt.NXTMotor rightMotor, IMonitor monitor)
      provides the reference transfer so that the class knows its corresponding navigation object (to obtain the current position of the car from) and starts the control thread.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private void drive​(double desiredVelocity, double desiredAngularVelocity)
      calculates the left and right angle speed of the both motors with given velocity and angle velocity of the robot also contains underlying control of angular velocity
      void exec_CTRL_ALGO()
      selection of control-mode
      private void exec_FAST_ALGO()
      DRIVING along black line with high speed of 15 cm/s and low d-control
      private void exec_INACTIVE()  
      private void exec_PARKCTRL_ALGO()
      parking along the generated trajectory
      private void exec_SETPOSE_ALGO()
      driving for destination with prior in setDriveFor-method set parameters enables controlled sequences of driving forward
      private void exec_SLOW_ALGO()
      DRIVING along black line with low speed of 7 cm/s and high d-control
      private void exec_VWCTRL_ALGO()
      the robot can be driven with velocity in cm/s or angular velocity in rad/s during VW Control Mode optionally one of them could be set to zero for simple test.

      get ctrl mode

    • Constructor Detail

      • ControlRST

        public ControlRST​(IPerception perception,
                  INavigation navigation,
                  lejos.nxt.NXTMotor leftMotor,
                  lejos.nxt.NXTMotor rightMotor,
                  IMonitor monitor)
        provides the reference transfer so that the class knows its corresponding navigation object (to obtain the current position of the car from) and starts the control thread.
        Parameters:
        perception - corresponding main module Perception class object
        navigation - corresponding main module Navigation class object
        monitor - corresponding main module Monitor class object
        leftMotor - corresponding NXTMotor object
        rightMotor - corresponding NXTMotor object

      • setDriveFor

        public void setDriveFor​(double x,
                        double y,
                        double phi,
                        double v,
                        double w,
                        lejos.robotics.navigation.Pose enteringPose)
        sets destination and speed for straight trajectory of SETPOSE-mode
        Specified by:
        setDriveFor in interface IControl
        Parameters:
        x - relative x destination in m
        y - relative y destination in m
        phi - relative heading in rad
        v - translatory velocity in cm/s
        w - angular velocity in rad/s
        enteringPose - current position while starting SETPOSE-mode

      • drive

        private void drive​(double desiredVelocity,
                   double desiredAngularVelocity)
        calculates the left and right angle speed of the both motors with given velocity and angle velocity of the robot also contains underlying control of angular velocity
        Parameters:
        desiredVelocity - velocity of the robot in cm/s
        desiredAngularVelocity - angle velocity of the robot in rad/s
